title: 167: Pro days, draft prep and scout stories
itunes:title: 167: Pro days, draft prep and scout stories
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks break down what they saw at the Clemson Pro Day and tell road stories from their time on the road traveling to other schools’ pro days. DJ and Bucky also scout the draft prospects, including the tight end class and the ceilings and floors for the quarterback prospects.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
